contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Dablink|See also [[Live at the Hollywood Bowl (disambiguation)|Live at the Hollywood Bowl]] for other artists' performances at the Hollywood Bowl}} {{Infobox Album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Live at the Hollywood Bowl | Type = live | Longtype = | Artist = [[Ben Harper|Ben Harper & the Innocent Criminals]] | Cover = | Released = 2003 | Recorded = August 4, 2003<br />[[Hollywood]], [[California]] | Genre = | Length = | Label = | Producer = | Reviews = | Last album = | This album = | Next album = }} {{Infobox Album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Live at the Hollywood Bowl EP | Type = EP | Longtype = | Artist = [[Ben Harper|Ben Harper & the Innocent Criminals]] | Cover = | Released = November 13, 2003 | Recorded = August 4, 2003<br />[[Hollywood]], [[California]] | Genre = | Length = | Label = Virgin | Producer = | Reviews = | Last album = | This album = | Next album = }} '''''Live at the Hollywood Bowl''''' is the first full-concert [[DVD]] by [[Ben Harper|Ben Harper & the Innocent Criminals]]. Recorded August 4, 2003 in [[Hollywood]], [[California]], it features a 15-song show, along with several extra music videos that Harper recorded. Released alongside this DVD was an EP of four or seven songs from the event. ==DVD Tracks== #"Glory & Consequence" #"Excuse Me Mr." #"Brown Eyed Blues" #"Temporary Remedy" #"Gold to Me" #"Sexual Healing" #"Steal My Kisses" #"Diamonds on the Inside" #"Amen Omen" #"Burn One Down" #"With My Own Two Hands/War" #"Walk Away" #"Waiting on an Angel" #"Blessed to Be a Witness" #"Like a King/I'll Rise" ==EP Tracks== #"Brown Eyed Blues" #"With My Own Two Hands/War" #"Sexual Healing" #"Amen Omen" *!!Bonus Material!! <ol start="5"> #"Walk Away" #"Excuse Me Mr." #"Temporary Remedy" </ol> {{Ben Harper}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Live At The Hollywood Bowl (Ben Harper Film)}} [[Category:2003 EPs]] [[Category:Ben Harper albums]] [[Category:2003 live albums]] [[Category:2003 video albums]] [[Category:Live EPs]] [[Category:Live video albums]] [[Category:Virgin Records live albums]] [[Category:Virgin Records video albums]] [[Category:Virgin Records EPs]] [[Category:Albums recorded at the Hollywood Bowl]] {{2000s-album-stub}}
